content: this crochet pattern is written to celebrate the 2025 pride month the title equality bucket hat celebrates the lgbtq+ members of the knitting and crocheting community #pridepodmal2025 this is a simple crochet pattern that involves basic crochet stitches the hat is worked top-down starting with the base of the hat at the top continued with the side and the rim the hat is worked as one piece although this is a free pattern without any formal test crocheters i have made all sizes included in the pattern and provided the measurements of the final product please head to my instagram @beextraknitting for any questions a video tutorial to complement this pattern will be provided on my youtube channel 1 @beextraknittingpodcast 09 june 2025 update version 3 now includes xl size 4 sizes are now available 1 https //youtu be/p7oa0gqmf2m si=hnn9q1w59vcuyfy0
